resources.string: SafeHer is a personal safety app created to empower users with quick and reliable emergency assistance. It features instant SOS alerts, voice activation, shake detection, panic mode with sirens and flashing lights, trusted contacts management, and a safe place locator. Our goal is to provide you with essential tools to stay safe and confident, ensuring your location and contact information is handled securely and used only for emergency purposes.

Help and User Manual
1. To send an SOS, tap the SOS button or shake your phone three times. You can also say "safeher help."

 2. Add or remove trusted contacts using the "Add Contacts" button or via the navigation drawer.

 3. Panic Mode plays a loud siren, flashes the flashlight, and sends your location every 2 minutes until turned off.

 4. The Fake Call feature simulates a real call to help you get out of dangerous situations.

 5. Tap "Safe Place" to find nearby police stations or hospitals.

 6. Your location is only shared during SOS alerts or Panic Mode.

 7. App permissions: Location, SMS, Microphone, Contacts.

 8. Use "Call Police" on the main screen for quick help.

 9. SafeHer supports multiple languages and keeps your data secure.

 10. SOS SMS works offline; location sharing requires GPS or internet.

 11. If GPS is unavailable, SOS is sent without location.

 12. Logout via the navigation drawer.

 13. For help or issues, email support@safeher.com.
